item.title: A Model of One Central Regulatory Circuit
item.description: Reference T.A. Bukharina, A.A. Akinshin, V.P. Golubyatnikov, D.P. Furman “A Model of one central regulatory circuit” (2020) // The Twelfth International Multiconference “Bioinformatics of genome regulation and structure/systems biology (BGRS/SB-2020)”. Publisher: Institute of Cytology and Genetics, Siberian Branch of the Russian Academy of Sciences, Novosibirsk State University. Pp. 143–144.
